page.syntax: C Result = HTML_STRTRAN( html as c , search as c [, replace as c])
page.description: Perform strtran on the plaintext of html.
page.discussion: Perform strtran (case-sensitive string replacement) on the plaintext of html..
page.example: ? html_strtran("<body> this is in the body </body>","body","*BODY TAG*") = "<body> this is in the *BODY TAG* </body>"
